notes.text: Extension API is now implemented to set custom message on ALP table
Partial processing has been introduced for the multi edit feature
AddressType in the Contact Facet annotation has been supported
An option to show appropriate message in the message bar above the list report table is now available
DynamicDateRange for DateTimeInterval is now supported
Confirmation dialog for warnings is now displayed in draft activation, if the messages come as transient message
There is an optional feature to improve the order on header facet
Side effect support of 1:1 associated fields is now added
Option for xxtension section in multi edit dialog for mass change is now added
HeaderContainer for Phones/Tablets is now available
The create button text in case of createWithFilters has been corrected
Fetching of variants in case of multi views is now rectified
The toast message is not displayed during the successful creation of an object using the dialog
Condition has been added for getting selected tab in scenario of quickVariantSelectionX
The appcomponent name have been formatted by replacing dots to slash as sap.ui.require.toUrl expects only slashes
Share button is disabled in create scenario when user is Jam Active
For Designtime, UI adaptation is now allowed for the controls that added themselves
Filter items that are not required are not instantiated anymore
